title: Zeek - DNS
description: -   This dashboard gives insights into DNS activities.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights into DNS activities.

## Widgets
1. Total DNS Requests
2. Timeline by DNS Request
3. Total DNS Responses
4. Timeline by DNS Response
5. DNS Requests by Client IP, Client Port
6. Top 10 Transport Layer Protocols of Connection
7. Top 10 DNS Query Types
8. Rejected DNS Requests by Client IP, Client Port
9. Top 10 DNS Response Codes
10. Top 10 DNS Queried Domain
11. Top 10 Rejected DNS Requests by Domain Name
12. Rejected DNS Requests by Region
13. DNS Log Details
14. Top 10 Responder IPs
15. Encrypted DNS Log Details
16. Total Generic DNS Tunnels Logs
17. Total Bytes Sent Over DNS Tunnel
18. Top 10 DNS Tunnelling Domains
19. Bytes Sent Over DNS Tunneling by Clients
20. Generic DNS Tunnels Log Details

definition.title: DNS Requests by Client IP, Client Port
Top 10 Transport Layer Protocols of Connection
Rejected DNS Requests by Client IP, Client Port
Top 10 Rejected DNS Requests by Domain Name
Total Bytes Sent Over DNS Tunnel
Bytes Sent Over DNS Tunneling by Clients
